title: pakhitheboss
author: pakhitheboss
content: It is time to create a new email addres and start using exchanges that are anonymous. From 1st of July the government will be collecting 1% TDS on both local and international exchanges that are operating in Indian.QuoteWhat does the law on TDS on VDA, crypto say?As per the new law, the purchaser of a virtual digital assets (VDA) is required to deduct 1% of the amount paid to the seller ( resident Indian) as income tax deducted at source (TDS). The tax is required to be deducted at the time of credit of amount or at the time of payment to the resident individual, whichever is earlier. The tax will be deducted only if the amount paid exceeds the specified limit, stated CBDT.Source

The tax will be deducted only if the amount paid exceeds the specified limit, stated CBDT.SourceI think. Everyone in the Indian crypto community is very well aware of this news, but anonymous Exchanges won't really be an option because in India all the exchanges have that clause of doing KyC before you can operate on them while if you use the foreign exchanges you won't get the facility to buy in INR or even sell in INR, the only way you'll be able to sell INR is Indian exchanges where eventually you'll have to get you Tds deducted.
